title: Pretty please stop the verbal advertising
body:
In the not too distant future:

"Welcome to the Vodafone League of Legends stream, brought to you by Logitech. I'm Dash, fed by Subway and these are our Statefarm analysts dressed by Emporio Armani. Today on our Coca Cola countdown we have Jatt Stats, brought to you by Chevrolet followed by an Acer Predator replay of our Mastercard player of the game's Mountain Dew moment of the game."

Please allow the sponsors' advertisements speak for themselves. The constant plugging of brands makes me feel sick.

It could be worse however, it could all be gambling companies.
